About Me

Hello, my name is Dominic Gerweck, I was born 1983 in the small town called Bretten, now living in a small village called Kirchlinteln in the district of Verden(Aller) in Lower Saxony.

I finished my training as a draftsman with additional qualification for "AVA" in 2003. My last main focus was on handling the announcement and leading the construction management.

In 2019 I became aware of the topic programming by a good friend. I started with great curiosity first to gather general information. Soon I set on learning more about C# and the dotnet-Framework. A great step now is doing the #100DaysOfCode challenge and follow the freeCodeCamp certifications guide to apply and develop my knowledge and skills in programming HTML, CSS and javaScript.

Now I'm looking for an apprenticeship as IT specialist for application development.

Last Work

Oelschlaeger Metalltechnik in Hoya

Laser Machine Operator • 2017 - 2019

During a short internship in the programming department I got first insights into the world of programming. These got me into learning more about this topic.

Engineering Office H.-D. Fritz in Bretten

junior Construction Manager • 2014 - 2016

I had the great chance to take high responsibility during the 2 years General-Renovation of the public outdor- and indoor pool in my hometown Bretten.

Education

Training as a draftsman (architecture)

graduation and additional qualification for "AVA" • 2003
